Why put it in handheld category? When he said it works on PSP and iPod, it doesn't mean it can ONLY work on the PSP and iPod. Don't forget PC works too.

I've downloaded an .mp4 movie before if you have an Xbox 360 as soon as you download the movie put it on a USB with enough GB to hold it and plug it into your Xbox 360 then go into video library, Storage Device, Cars (folder) then watch it.
